lead_paragraph: HOLT--Jenny. The United States Holocaust Memorial Museum mourns the loss of Jenny Holt, a Holocaust survivor born in Lodz, Poland and married to Irving Holt, also a Holocaust survivor, for 70 years. She is survived by her son, the Museum's Vice Chair Allan Holt and his wife Shelley, a daughter, Dot Cheriff and her husband Frank; four grandchildren, four great-grand- children and sisters, Esther Drew and Sally Wolfe. The Museum sends its heartfelt condolences to Irving Holt and the entire Holt Family. Tom A. Bernstein, Council Chair; Sara J. Bloomfield, Museum Director 1/3
